channel.title: EPFL on Yiyuan Fang's Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in EPFL on Yiyuan Fang's Stuff

item.title: EPFL vs Yale
item.description: Yesterday was the last day of my first year at EPFL, so I think I’ve gathered some observations to wrtie this article General Yale – I did my bachelor’s here. It is a private uni located New Haven, Connecticut, USA. EPFL – Ecole Polytechnique de Lausanne, I am doing my Master’s here. It is a public uni located near Lausanne, Switzerland. Tutition Demographics Yale – Around ~ 4700 undergraduates (even less when I was there).
